contentfulPagePressRelease.title: Qatar Career Fair 2014 – Focal Points Meeting

childMarkdownRemark.html:
On Monday 30 September 2013 from 10 am to 12 pm (in the Al Khor Hall at the Club House at Qatar Foundation) Qatar Career Fair (QCF) held its Focal Points Meeting which discussed the following:

1. A report on the results achieved in Qatar Career Fair 2013
2. Online Registration to participate in Qatar Career Fair 2014

The first item revolved around the report on the results the exhibiting companies have achieved by their participation in Qatar Career Fair 2013; they were called to fill the electronic form prepared by Qatar Career Fair for this purpose and include statistics about the education, employment, training and development opportunities provided in QCF 2013.

The second point of the agenda introduced the online registration for Qatar Career Fair 2014. It was noted that the online registration for Qatar Career Fair will open from 25 November to 26 December 2013.

The attendees were informed about the possibility to be keenly involved in the activities that will be taking place throughout the days of the Fair.

The meeting ended with an open debate allowing attendees to exchange views with the organizers of the meeting.

To read the full article on QCF’s website, please click here
